Summary: 2 events of jets being followed by 5-8 UFOs.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 9:00 pm, I was cooking, when my boyfriend and children began calling me to look outside, there was 2 jets, and along side were 2 UFOs with steady white lights, and when it flew over and I went to get my camera, there were about 4 more behind, flying very closely, and based on the amount of crafts there should have been alot more sound but it sounded like there was only one aircraft, it looked like they UFOs were guiding the jets, then again around 9:36 pm there was again there was 1 jet and 2 UFOs flying right behind it, they were going pretty slow and made a slight turn in unison. This is not something that happens here alot even though we see UFOs around here almost daily. I olost sight of the object due to trees in my way.
